calm_greeting.text: Elena looks up from her writing desk with a gentle smile. 'Good to see you, wayfarer. How are the roads treating you today? Is there anything I can help you with?'

choices.text: "Could you help me write a letter?"
"I heard you know about the merchant schedules..."
"How have you been since the fire?"
"I might know someone who needs a scribe."

friendly_farewell.text: Elena waves warmly. 'Safe travels, friend. May your deliveries be swift and your roads clear.'

offer_services.text: Elena's eyes light up. 'Of course! I charge 2 coins for a simple letter, 5 for official formatting. Your words will be given the respect and clarity they deserve.'

share_knowledge.text: Elena nods knowingly. 'The merchants gather at the east gate every morning at the seventh bell. The caravan to Riverside leaves shortly after. This information has served me well - may it do the same for you.'

addInformation.text: Merchants gather at east gate at seventh bell each morning

reflect_on_past.text: Elena's expression grows thoughtful. 'It's been difficult, but I'm rebuilding. Every day gets a little easier. The kindness of people like you helps more than you know. We all need to look after each other in these times.'

eager_interest.text: Elena sits up straighter, hope brightening her features. 'Really? Oh, that would be wonderful! I promise they won't regret hiring me. My penmanship is flawless and I know all the proper forms. Please, tell them about me!'

createQuest.description: Find permanent scribing work for Elena
